state_summary: Neil Murray, founder and general partner at The Nordic Web Ventures, announces the close of $6 million Fund III to invest in early-stage founders in the region, focusing on robotics, AI-native companies, and deep tech.
evidence: The fund will focus on writing the first institutional checks to companies focused on robotics, AI-native companies, and deep tech founders.

Murray has written the first check into more than 50 companies, with a portfolio including the unicorn Lovable and the remote worker insurance companySafetyWing, and exits like the UI design company Uizard.
The Nordic ecosystem is now valued at more than half a trillion dollars and received more than $8 billion in venture funding in 2024.
